episodes.synopsis: The summer ice melt in the Arctic offers feeding and migratory opportunities for Arctic foxes and narwhals, while polar bears find it harder to hunt.
episodes.title: Behind the Scenes of The Great Melt

episodes.synopsis: Follow a family of hungry grizzly bears as they await the arrival of salmon that travel each year from the Pacific Ocean to mountain streams.
episodes.title: Behind the Scenes of The Great Salmon Run

episodes.synopsis: A pride of lions awaits the herds of zebra and wildebeest that roam through the Serengeti once a year, providing many a meal for the hungry predators.
episodes.title: Behind the Scenes of The Great Migration

episodes.synopsis: Travel along the South African coast to witness the annual sardine run, which feeds dolphins, sharks, whales and more but has become less predictable.
episodes.title: Behind the Scenes of The Great Tide

episodes.synopsis: Elephant families eagerly head for the wetlands provided by the great flood of Okavango, trekking across the harsh desert to reach the precious water.
episodes.title: Behind the Scenes of The Great Flood

episodes.synopsis: The abundance of food provided by Alaska's summertime plankton bloom attracts many a sea creature, some of which swim thousands of miles to reach it.
episodes.title: Behind the Scenes of The Great Feast

video.title: Nature's Great Events: Diaries
video.synopsis: Look behind the scenes of this wildlife documentary series that examines how animals around the world adapt to chaotic natural phenomena.
